issue.title: [Rust] Enhance documentation for parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4941](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4941). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ultimately this is just one piece of completing ARROW-4683. In order to enable a lint check for missing docs, we'll want to cover any existing gaps in the documentation.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4941?focusedCommentId=17332025) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/41
